altername_name: CR Hissatsu Shigotonin: Pachitte Chonmage @ VP@CHI
name: CR Hissatsu Shigotonin Pachitte Chonmage @ VPACHI
overview: CR Hissatsu Shigotonin Pachitte Chonmage @VPACHI (CR必殺仕事人 パチってちょんまげ@VPACHI) is a pachinko game for the Sega Dreamcast. It is based on the television series Hissatsu Shigotonin.
